title: Monitor Tailings Dam
description: A geotechnical engineer monitors instrumentation on a tailings storage facility (TSF) to ensure its stability.

tasks.description: Retrieve real-time data from the piezometers within the tailings dam, which measure water pressure.
tasks.expected_outcome: A trend chart of pore water pressure is displayed.

tasks.description: Compare the current water pressure levels against the design limits and alarm thresholds.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows that pressure in one area is approaching the alarm level.

tasks.description: Create a notification for the operations team to increase pumping from the decant pond to lower the phreatic surface within the dam.
tasks.expected_outcome: An instruction is sent to operations to take action to lower the water level.
